visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type is 'line', chart title is 'Monthly Average Rainfall', axes and labels styling includes specific colors and font sizes, data series includes monthly rainfall data, custom colors are provided, and additional configurations include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a line chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'line', and it includes a border with a specific color and width. The x-axis displays month categories with styled labels, while the y-axis has a title and labels styled similarly. The legend is positioned vertically with a white background, floating to the left. The tooltip displays series name and point data in a formatted manner. The data series includes monthly rainfall data with a custom color. Additional configurations include custom colors for series and plot options to disable markers on the line.
